welcome_benefits: Hotel and Holiday Voucher Worth ₹2,000 Each. ₹5,000 Flight Voucher on Spends of ₹25,000 Within 60 Days of Card Activation

Movie & Dining: 50% Off Upto ₹500 on BMS Bookings. Dining Discounts With the Culinary Treats Programme
Rewards Rate: 7 Adani Reward Points/₹100 on Spends Made With Adani Ecosystem
Reward Redemption: Redeem on Adani Rewards. 1 Adani Reward Point = ₹1
Travel: Exclusive Airport Benefits (Meet and Greet, Premium Upgrades and More)
Domestic Lounge Access: 4 Free Domestic Airport Lounge Visits Each Quarter

fees_charges.Spend-Based Waiver: Annual Fee Waiver on Spends of ₹6 Lakh or More
fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% Fuel Surcharge Waiver on Fuel Transactions (Up to ₹4,000)
fees_charges.Cash Advance Charges: 2.5% of the Amount Withdrawn, Subject to a Minimum of ₹500

product_details: Earn 7% Adani reward points per ₹100 spent on Adani One and other Adani companies.
Earn 1.5% Adani reward points per ₹100 spent domestically.
Earn 2% Adani reward points per ₹100 spent internationally.
Earn 0.5% Adani reward points per ₹100 on utility and insurance spends.
International and domestic airport lounge access is offered for primary cardholders.
